actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the Court of Claims to hear and make determinations with respect to certain claims and for other purposes.

summary.text: Panama Claims Act - Provides, through actions filed in the Court of Claims, for United States compensation for losses sustained as a result of the nationalization, expropriation, or other uncompensated seizure of property owned directly or indirectly by United States citizens. Directs that such compensation be paid out of funds appropriated for assistance to Panama.

titles.title: A bill to confer jurisdiction upon the Court of Claims to hear and make determinations with respect to certain claims and for other purposes.
